plan_state.explanation: I fixed ObservedObject setup for Linux, added @StateObject and @EnvironmentObject plus .environmentObject(_:) support, updated the feature parity doc, and validated with tests. Next we can discuss priorities for the remaining missing views (List, Picker, etc.).

plan.step: Scan project structure, docs, and sources to identify gaps
Fix ObservedObject wiring to work on Linux (remove macOS-only guard)
Implement @StateObject property wrapper and wire it into node state + invalidation
Build and run tests to verify changes
